annotations.description: Today's cocktail is one of the few that I am tasting for the first time that I make on this show and it really it's a crowd pleaser. The other plus to this d...
annotations.title: An Easy Caribbean Cocktail For Summer With The La Florida

textContent:
1oz (30ml) White Rum
.5oz (15ml) Sweet Vermouth
.25oz (7.5ml) Creme de Cacao [white]
1 Tsp. Dry Curacao
1 Tsp. Grenadine
1oz (30ml) Lime Juice
Orange Twist (garnish)

Shake and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m88UijZFIEQ
title: La Florida
